name: Pro Sniper Duck Season 3D
description:
Pro Sniper Duck Season 3D has a great game play and will give you the feeling that you are a real hunter. This game is all about precision, aiming and timing. Don’t forget to pull the trigger otherwise you’ll will never hunt the ducks.
Features:
- First person 3D Shooting
- Efficient Weapon control
- 3D Graphics and Sound Effects
- Real time Duck Hunting with animations
